channel.title: Comments on: Salt, sky and sand on a 4×4 trip through Bolivia

item.title: By: Four months of South America in photos - Duff's Suitcase
item.dc:creator: Four months of South America in photos - Duff's Suitcase
item.description: […] Atacama Desert, where I stood under huge steaming geysers and floated in salt lagoons, 4x4ing through the desert of Bolivia’s altiplano and seeing the sun rise over the world’s largest salt flat, bird watching and piranha fishing […]
item.content:encoded: […] Atacama Desert, where I stood under huge steaming geysers and floated in salt lagoons, 4x4ing through the desert of Bolivia’s altiplano and seeing the sun rise over the world’s largest salt flat, bird watching and piranha fishing […]

item.title: By: Johan Van Der Walt
item.dc:creator: Johan Van Der Walt
item.description: Very insightful. Thanx for the travel tips. I love the dessert!
item.content:encoded: Very insightful. Thanx for the travel tips. I love the dessert!
